page.title: 16LOCAL SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: OUR CLASS CONDUCTED A SURVEY ON LOCAL SOCIAL CONCERN.WE WENT TO ALL THE HOUSES IN{GILBERTSON ROAD}AND WE EACH TOOK A SHEET HOME TO OUR PARENTS.THE LIST OF ITEMS OF LOCAL SOCIAL CONCERN WAS:{RATES , VANDALISM , CLOSURE OF {TELEPHONE EXCHANGE, FOOD PRICES, HOUSE {PRICES AND TEACHER'S STRIKE. EACH PERSON HAD TO CHOOSE THE THREE ITEMS MOST IMPORTANT TO THEM AND COULD ADD ANYTHING THEY THOUGHT TO BE OF CONCERN LOCALLY.THE RESULTS SHOWING WHAT CONCERNED PEOPLE MOST AT THE MOMENT WERE AS FOLLOWS: {RATES 44% VANDALISM 33% {FOOD PRICES 11% TEACHER'S STRIKE 5% {CLOSURE OF TELEPHONE EXCHANGE 5% {HOUSE PRICES 3% {ENVIRONMENTAL DESTRUCTION 3%
